description: The series` creator, Akira Toriyama shows up in order to celebrate the one-year anniversary of the show. The special event that he holds is a giant game of kick-the-can, in which he promises the winner can have anything they desire. This causes Senbei-san to travel across the globe in the hopes of obtaining victory.

titles.title: Le grand jeu de cache cache
Thanks! The Kick the Can Celebration Party
あんがと! 謝恩カンケリ大会
